name: player yards created and blocked + team yards blocked
description: Test case for player yards created and blocked + team yards blocked
expected_query: with "tfb93dcd44ab757d4850892997e7cf913" as (select COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid) as pid, SUM(yards_created) as yards_created_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(bc_pid, trg_pid)), "tf43d33db80d44ffef7d19938f615ed8a" as (select COALESCE(bc_pid) as pid, SUM(yards_blocked) as yards_blocked_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(bc_pid)), "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75" as (select "nfl_plays"."off" as "nfl_team", SUM(yards_blocked) AS team_yards_blocked_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."off"), "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75_team_stats" as (select "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75"."nfl_team", sum(tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75.team_yards_blocked_from_plays) as team_yards_blocked_from_plays from "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75" group by "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75"."nfl_team") select "player"."pid", "tfb93dcd44ab757d4850892997e7cf913"."yards_created_from_plays" AS "yards_created_from_plays_0", "tf43d33db80d44ffef7d19938f615ed8a"."yards_blocked_from_plays" AS "yards_blocked_from_plays_0", "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75_team_stats"."team_yards_blocked_from_plays" AS "team_yards_blocked_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tfb93dcd44ab757d4850892997e7cf913" on "tfb93dcd44ab757d4850892997e7cf913"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "tf43d33db80d44ffef7d19938f615ed8a" on "tf43d33db80d44ffef7d19938f615ed8a"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75_team_stats" on "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75_team_stats"."nfl_team" = "player"."current_nfl_team" group by "tfb93dcd44ab757d4850892997e7cf913"."yards_created_from_plays", "tf43d33db80d44ffef7d19938f615ed8a"."yards_blocked_from_plays", "tf9e31213bfe601b4245ca3649ea5bf75_team_stats"."team_yards_blocked_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
